author: cziegeler
msg: New getSitemapPath() method on the Request object to get the path to the
current sitemap even if you are in a sub sitemap. Added an abstract request

author: sylvain
msg: Replace getSitemapPath() by getInterpreterID() to distinguish user value scopes as several sitemaps can be mounted on the same path

author: vgritsenko
msg: Call children validators first, then call self validators regardless of results.
